text:
Do it like this,
Translate and than Write (which is improve writing), remove Rephrase and Summarize.
With Write, add also featrures:
Correction only (with a toggle)
Style (with a pull down, with:
Writing styles: Simple, Bussiness, Cassual, Academic
Tone: Enthousiastic, Friendly, Conficent, Diplomatic).
